attributes.review: I went here to find any reasons why he was a good president and I couldn’t find anything. All of the “good” things had other things contradicting itself. And the things that didn’t weren’t even actually done.
attributes.title: Trump

attributes.review: Listen, Trump has done so many horrible things why in the world would anybody want this app. It is impossible to describe how horrible the app is so please just leave while you still can.
attributes.title: It absolutely sucked

attributes.review: Terrible app don’t get it!!! It litterly was glitching throughout everything 🙄🤮 and it literally exposed a video of trump harassing his own daughter 🤮 and it made me faint now im at the hospital and it can cause my death 😢😤😤 buuuuusssss sometimes I don’t wanna b happy 😃 😢😢 don’t hold it against me ✋🏽🖐🏽😾😈😃😢😢😏😱😱😢
attributes.title: Terrible app!!!🙄

attributes.review: I downloaded this app for my cat. As soon as I did my cat died. This app is the worst app I have ever seen in my whole entire life. It is disgusting, why would anyone want to have this app. I hope you never decide to download.
attributes.title: disappointed.

attributes.review: It was a very bad experience the quality was not good and point behind the app has no meaning very slow and just overall do not recommend
attributes.title: The quality

attributes.review: I thought this would be an immaculate app, however, Trump is bogus so idk what I was thinking tehe. He do be racist and has done nothing that he said he would do. My pet hermit crab would be a superior president than Trump. Absolute garbage app. 10/10 don’t recommend. Thanks bbgs! ✌️
attributes.title: Uh oh stinky

attributes.review: I think this app may be broken because when I open it it only shows a tangerine tyrant turning this country into a joke and only playing golf in the middle of crisis. Needs to be fixed
attributes.title: A joke

attributes.review: I really don’t like this app my phone was kept glitching REALLY bad and I didn’t like it and this app is so slow I’m not going to wait for like hours or somthing😒 I honestly don’t see what’s the point of getting this app it’s really bad🥱
attributes.title: The worse app EVER

attributes.review: I tried downloading this app for a great grand child, she's sadly a Trump supporter. She said it made her feel forced to vote for him, she is only 46 years old! She started reading information about Donald J Trump to her put turtle because she has becoming delusional. Do not recommend!
attributes.title: Terrible App!

attributes.review: I went into this app it was poorly designed and most of all I was just wondering how I got from Minecraft to this and how this app got on my phone. I’m deleting because it is a horrible app with bad design
attributes.title: Who designed this app
